lang.name: home_description_bis
lang.text:
Moozie is an easy to use and efficient robot.
Have fun with moozie and moderate your server!

commands_general.name: channelinfo
commands_general.text: information on a voice or text channel

commands_general.name: upvote
commands_general.text: Command to go vote for the bot

commands_general.name: userid [mention]
commands_general.text: Have the id of a member

commands_general.name: support
commands_general.text: Command to join the support server

commands_general.name: avis
commands_general.text: Command to give an opinion on the bot

commands_general.name: patchnote
commands_general.text: Command for details of bot patches

commands_general.name: member
commands_general.text: know the number of members on the server

commands_general.name: uptime
commands_general.text: know when the bot was rebooted

commands_social.name: youtube [search]
commands_social.text: search for a youtube video or a youtuber

commands_moderation.name: ban [mention]
commands_moderation.text: ban a member from the server

commands_moderation.name: kick [mention]
commands_moderation.text: kick a member from the server

commands_moderation.name: tempmute [mention] [time]
commands_moderation.text: mutates a member for a limited time

commands_moderation.name: addrole [mention] [role]
commands_moderation.text: add a role to a member

commands_moderation.name: antilink
commands_moderation.text: ban links from other discord server

commands_level.name: rank
commands_level.text: display your XP numbers and your rank

commands_economy.name: removecoin [mention] [amount]
commands_economy.text: take money away from a member

commands_ticket.name: ticket
commands_ticket.text: create a ticket (only on the support server)
